subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Robert K. Kraft, owner of the New England Patriots, said on Wednesday that he had been wrong to believe the N.F.L. would exonerate Tom Brady in the scandal over deflated footballs.
snippet: Robert K. Kraft, owner of the New England Patriots, said on Wednesday that he had been wrong to believe the N.F.L. would exonerate Tom Brady in the scandal over deflated footballs.
